com.azure.identity.credential

Class ClientCertificateCredential

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.azure.identity.credential.ClientCertificateCredential
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TokenCredential

    public class ClientCertificateCredential
extends java.lang.Object
    An AAD credential that acquires a token with a client certificate for an AAD application.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClientCertificateCredential()
      Creates a ClientSecretCredential with default identity client options.
      ClientCertificateCredential(IdentityClientOptions identityClientOptions)
      Creates a ClientSecretCredential with default identity client options.

      • pfxCertificate

                                                  java.lang.String clientCertificatePassword)
        Sets the client certificate for authenticating to AAD.
        Parameters:
        certificatePath - the password protected PFX file containing the certificate
        clientCertificatePassword - the password protecting the PFX file
        Returns:
        the credential itself
